Take Your Home With You

Your whole home – one app. Control everything from lights, locks, security and more, all from a smartphone. Alarm Zone cloaks your home in an interactive web with strategically placed devices; making home life easy and safe. It’s not security. It’s a way of life.

Smoke detectors

A smoke detector is recommended to be placed on each level of a home along with a siren. Whether you have a basement or a 2 to 3-story home, you will need to place one on each level per fire department regulations.

GPS vehicle tracking

Get customizable alerts via email or text if your teenager or loved one is speeding or even if they are going to places they shouldn't. Keep an eye on them while they are away from home or at college.

Security sensors

The most common piece of security equipment when it comes to securing your home, door or window sensors are used to detect when any door or window is opened. We use wireless micro sensors to help keep them inconspicuous and out of the way.
